last_episode_to_air.name: ...Family Ties
last_episode_to_air.overview: Four St. Louis Brides with strong family ties go head-to-head in a wedding showdown for a chance to win the honeymoon of a lifetime.

name: Four Weddings
overview: Four Weddings is a lifestyle reality game show that has aired on Sky Living since 6 July 2009.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Catty wedding showdown contest in which four brides fight for an all-expenses paid honeymoon. A Hertfordshire bride is hosting an African spectacular, while a rival sets her ceremony in a cave. Also, a former glamour model is having a classy WAG-style reception while a Gloucester girl plans a breezy, cheesy party.

episodes.name: And a Boat to Catch
episodes.overview: One bride makes a memorable grand entrance, while another books a rotating reception venue.

episodes.name: And a Snow Machine
episodes.overview: Featuring a tradition-hating free spirit, a woman hosting a lavish fairytale celebration and a Scottish ceremony complete with a Highland band.

episodes.name: And a Haunted House
episodes.overview: A Derby couple are adding the final touches to their fairytale wedding while a Londoner plans a traditional Russian celebration.

episodes.name: And Fireworks
episodes.overview: One bride plans a lavish wedding, featuring an eight-piece orchestra and a fireworks display, while another keeps hers simple and traditional.

episodes.name: And a Street Parade
episodes.overview: Included: a wedding inspired by the 1940s; an elaborate first dance.

episodes.name: And Three Raccoons
episodes.overview: One bride serves pizza and beer at her laid-back reception, while another has champagne tastes. Also: a Spanish ceremony; and a Venetian masquerade reception.

episodes.name: And a Bubble Man
episodes.overview: Included: a circus-theme wedding; a springtime brunch reception.

episodes.name: And Something Blue
episodes.overview: One bride plans on doing everything by the book, while another steps out in an aqua-blue wedding dress. Also featured: a beach wedding in the Florida Keys; a chic reception in a Japanese garden.

episodes.name: Series 2, Episode 2
episodes.overview: One bride books samba dancers to perform at her wedding, while another thinks her sexy wedding gown will give her the edge.

episodes.name: Series 2, Episode 3
episodes.overview: A bride adheres to tradition for her ceremony, while another adds creative elements to her big day. Also: a wedding featuring a tiki bar and steel drum; nuptials at a mansion.

episodes.name: Series 2, Episode 4
episodes.overview: One bride plans a reception featuring barbecue from a local eatery, while another coordinates an elaborate sit-down meal festooned with sparkling decor. Also: a choreographed dance.

episodes.name: Series 2, Episode 5
episodes.overview: Free-spirited Samantha's laid-back nuptials contrast with detail-oriented Nazia's elaborate Indian wedding. Also featured: a milk-and-cookie bar; a hip-hop reception.

episodes.name: Series 2, Episode 6
episodes.overview: A lifelong New Yorker thinks her sexy vintage wedding dress will impress her fellow brides, which include a tomboy, a traditionalist and a tough New York cop.

episodes.name: And a Toast to Me
episodes.overview: One bride plans an intimate wedding with only 33 attendees, while another aims to impress with a glitz and glamour. Also: a wedding on a horse farm; an emotional Jewish ceremony.

episodes.name: Series 2, Episode 8
episodes.overview: A rocker bride exchanges heartfelt vows in an outdoor ceremony, while another bride wears a princess gown to her fairytale wedding. Other nuptials take place on a rustic farm and in a modern venue.

episodes.name: Four Weddings Biggest Blunders
episodes.overview: Wedding-day dos and don'ts are discussed in this look back at the first two seasons.

episodes.name: And Dancing Zombies
episodes.overview: A Halloween wedding goes up against a multicultural affair.

episodes.name: And the Leaning Tower of Eiffel
And a Smoking Coctail
episodes.overview: One bride wears a couture gown with a feather skirt, while another's dress includes DIY handiwork. Also: a reception is held inside a theater; and a certified diver weds and plunges into a shark tank.

episodes.name: And a Dancing Santa
episodes.overview: Santa Claus makes an appearance at one winter wedding, while the dance floor gets jam-packed at another. Also: one bride makes a grand entrance on a retractable staircase; and another is serenaded by her sorority sisters.

episodes.name: And an Awkward Pirate
episodes.overview: Santa Claus makes an appearance at one winter wedding, while the dance floor gets jam-packed at another. Also: one bride makes a grand entrance on a retractable staircase; and another is serenaded by her sorority sisters.

episodes.name: Biggest Blunders
episodes.overview: One bride walks down the aisle with her dog, while another entertains guests with a pirate impersonator and a German band. Also: a wedding with an over-the-top food spread.

episodes.name: Four Weddings: More Big Blunders
episodes.overview: Wedding gaffes from Season 3 include drunk guests, inappropriate dancing and forgetful officiants.

episodes.name: And a Swamp Buggy
episodes.overview: A groom arrives in a swamp buggy, while a bride's guests ride in rickshaws at an Asian-theme ceremony. Also: a bride's rap-and-dance routine; a foodie's dream reception.

episodes.name: And a Pizza Delivery
episodes.overview: A laid-back bride plans a rock-theme bash, while there will be no drinking or dancing at another's religious nuptials. Also: a reception with a martini bar.

episodes.name: And Two Wedding Crashers
episodes.overview: One bride has a backyard bash on a budget, while another goes all out for her black-tie affair. Also: a horse-and-carriage entrance.

episodes.name: And a Bling Team!
episodes.overview: A bride wears a pre-owned gown down the aisle, while another has a birdcage veil. Also: a backdrop of paper flowers for guest portraits; a DJ accompanied by a percussionist.

episodes.name: And a Thousand Cranes
episodes.overview: One bride's reception features a large Italian meal, while another's offers a minimal menu. Also: a reception that begins with signature drinks; a celebration with vodka snow cones and cotton candy.

episodes.name: And a Talking Parrot
episodes.overview: One bride's 11 bridesmaids select their own rainbow-hued dresses, while another bride dresses her party in black. Also: a bride's entrance on a yacht; Hollywood impersonators and a bride's music video.

episodes.name: And a Frog Dance
episodes.overview: Aimee favors Gothic wedding décor for her rock and roll wedding, while Megan lightens up with pastel peonies for her centerpieces. Angie's booked an elegant downtown ballroom for her pricey reception and Erica exchanges vows at sunset on the bow of ship.

episodes.name: And a Dance Off
episodes.overview: A bride's garden wedding is inspired by her obsession with fairies, while another's honors her fiancé's Moroccan heritage. Also: a bride's family's band who play at her reception; a Greek celebration that includes fireworks.

episodes.name: And a Mechanical Bull
episodes.overview: A choreographed flash mob takes over a dance floor at one bride's reception, while another's features a mechanical bull. Also: a scavenger hunt for guests; a wedding with the latest electronic gadgets.

episodes.name: And a Water Park
episodes.overview: A bride gets married at a winery, while another's wedding takes place at a water park. Also: an eight-course Russian meal; a reception catered by a chef named Cowboy.

episodes.name: And an Awards Ceremony
episodes.overview: A Cinco de Mayo wedding features an all-female mariachi band, while a bride's guests take part in a traditional Persian ceremony. Also: a reception with an awards ceremony; a celebration with an opening toast.

episodes.name: And Cheese Fries
episodes.overview: A French-Canadian reception has a smoked-meat buffet, while another features a Bollywood dance. Also: a Mardi Gras-theme wedding with more than 400 guests; an intimate, budget-conscious ceremony in the country.

episodes.name: And Fist Pumping
episodes.overview: A bride's first dance features rumba and salsa numbers; a reception has a "Jersey Shore" theme; a woman shows off three gowns on a red carpet; a wedding has a coral-hued decor.

episodes.name: And a Rally Towel
episodes.overview: One reception has rally towels, while another features a memorable father-daughter dance. Also: A woman's son figures prominently in her vows; and a ceremony displays interfaith traditions.

episodes.name: And a Bridal Party Band
episodes.overview: A bride throws a traditional Serbian ceremony, while another sits in on the drums. Also: a choreographed flash mob; a wedding planned entirely by the groom.

episodes.name: And a Ballet
episodes.overview: One bride has a simple reception with a cash bar, while another bride invites 400 guests to her elaborate wedding, which features ballet dancers, soccer players and capoeira performers. Also: a ceremony in a fairy-tale castle; a wedding in an art gallery.

episodes.name: And a Racy Tattoo
episodes.overview: A bride wears a gown that shows off a tattoo on her back, while another is proud of her multiple dresses. Also: two weddings that go to extremes when it comes to flowers.

episodes.name: And a Pig Dance
episodes.overview: An adults-only reception is preceded by a Persian and Macedonian ceremony, while another celebration has a candy theme. Also: a cocktail party inside a wedding chapel; a bride's dance with her daughter.

episodes.name: And Cherry Blossoms
episodes.overview: A bride's pizza-party reception was planned in two months, while another's downtown wedding took a year-and-a-half to put together. Also: a Gothic-inspired ceremony; a cherry-blossom theme.

episodes.name: And a Contortionist
episodes.overview: A Halloween wedding with spooky decor; a big Italian wedding at a country estate; an elegant winter wedding; a barn reception.

episodes.name: And a Leprechaun
episodes.overview: One reception has plenty of alcohol, while another features a leprechaun. Also: vows with a history lesson; a wedding that unites two Native American tribes.

episodes.name: And Ballpark Peanuts
episodes.overview: One bride's wedding features pipe-organ music and maracas, while another's honors her Portuguese heritage. Also: handwritten quotes on rocks; a reception with late-night snacks.

episodes.name: And a Windstorm
episodes.overview: A Marilyn Monroe impersonator does a tango and changes her dress twice, while another bride marries a cowboy at a winery. Also: a wedding in a chapel in the woods; a ceremony in a redwood forest.

episodes.name: And a Circus
episodes.overview: One bride's reception has a circus theme with peanuts and a barbecue, while another's garden affair is catered by a food truck. Also: a cruise-ship wedding; a ceremony at an observatory.

episodes.name: And a Bacon Bar
episodes.overview: Bacon is on a reception's menu at Harvard University, while guests sit on hay bales at a backyard celebration. Also: a medieval-castle wedding; a ceremony under a whale skeleton at a maritime museum.

episodes.name: And a Love Lasso
episodes.overview: One bride is serenaded by her sorority sisters on a cruise, while another performs a dance. Also: a wedding with a black-and-white theme; a garden ceremony featuring a lassoed groom.

episodes.name: And a Russian Cabaret
episodes.overview: One bride's Parisian-theme wedding is a Francophile's dream, while another's sizzles with romance. Also: a Latin-inspired reception; an extravagant Russian cabaret.

episodes.name: And Dueling Peacocks
episodes.overview: A jungle-theme brunch with monkeys; a bride with a much younger groom; a bride's dress that's augmented by a red-and-black color scheme; a bride with a fondness for peacocks.

episodes.name: And a Mardi Gras Indian
episodes.overview: New Orleans-style weddings feature Mardi Gras Indians; king cakes and a second-line band; and a French Quarter-theme reception. Also: wedding vows in a castle.

episodes.name: And a Red Velvet Funnel Cake
episodes.overview: Rachele enters her reception to the beat of performing drummers; Nicolle's husband's college mascot helps cut the cake; Travia celebrates her wedding and 30th birthday.

episodes.name: And Bling-Blau
episodes.overview: A wedding reception features a forest of artificial trees, while another has tables decorated with sunflowers. Also: a country-chic affair.

episodes.name: And Chocolate Handcuffs
episodes.overview: One bride opts for an eco-friendly celebration, while a Chicago police officer springs for chocolate-handcuff favors. Also: a reception with traditional Greek dancing; and another with a German polka.

episodes.name: And a Hookah Lounge
episodes.overview: Dena's kindergarten students offer their take on marital advice, while Ashley brings her wonderland to life with a hookah lounge. Shannon's love of antique keys turns her wedding into a vintage affair and Sarah's BBQ hoedown starts at the watering hole.

episodes.name: And the King of Rock & Roll
episodes.overview: Kalli adds an Elvis impersonator to her guest list, while Maria leads her bridal party in a choreographed Wedding Wobble. Carrie uses star-shaped lanterns to create a celestial canopy and Beth's dog Nick fetches the wedding rings.

episodes.name: And a Moustache
episodes.overview: Melissa's guests are greeted by a tortoise at her tropical backyard vows and Georgia's guests cheer on costumed Greek dancers. Christina's dressed in bling and blue, from her tiara to her shoes, while Kelly tops everything with a moustache cutout.

episodes.name: ...Family Ties
episodes.overview: Four St. Louis Brides with strong family ties go head-to-head in a wedding showdown for a chance to win the honeymoon of a lifetime.

episodes.name: And an Army Salute
episodes.overview: Kathy's Coney Island bash showcases NY, while Stacyann treats her guests to traditional Jamaican goat soup and other island cuisine. Amanda receives a very special Army salute at her wedding, and Larissa's butterfly theme makes everyone's heart flutter.

episodes.name: And a Pilgrim
episodes.overview: Jessica and her groom unveil their wrist tattoos at during their backyard wedding, while Lynette exchanges rings at a working cattle farm. Wendy's guests are greeted by pilgrims, while Nicole's guests are treated to boat cruise around Boston Harbor.

episodes.name: And a Giraffe
episodes.overview: Amber brings the islands to the mainland at her Hawaiian-themed reception, while Shelly incorporates her Afghan heritage. Fashion-focused Whitney is knows her swan dress will turn heads and Christine's earth-friendly theme is showcased at her zoo nuptials.

episodes.name: And a Dracula's Castle
episodes.overview: Marie uses her 6-figure budget to create an elaborate Dracula's Castle, while Zoranda has surprising news to shock her guests. Karen exchanges vows on an island dock and Anumita's New York wedding is held at a landmark hotel.

episodes.name: And a Taxi Cab
episodes.overview: Chrissy's zigzag décor stands out at her wedding, while Kara's ice luge for shots gets the attention at her reception. Kristin's serves hot dogs during cocktail hour at her black tie affair and Emily rides to her reception in a yellow taxi cab.

episodes.name: And a Bodyguard
episodes.overview: Thais turns her beach wedding into an black tie gala, while nature loving Rebecca brings the outdoors in to her banquet hall bash. Wanda hosts a Christmas derby to celebrate her love, and Nataly hires bodyguards to protect her million dollar diamonds.

episodes.name: And a Russian Cabaret
episodes.overview: Geysall's Parisian themed wedding is complete with the tastes of France, while Kimberly's big day is filled with white, hot romance. Santa attends Dana's hora loca and Irina's special guest participates in her lavish Russian cabaret.

episodes.name: And a Super Storm
episodes.overview: Lisa's wedding guests buzz about her beehive-shaped cake, while Andria's guests are surprised by her rock star performance. A super storm threatens to wash out Enza's Autumn themed I Do's, while Heather's Holiday nuptials start off with fresh snow fall.

episodes.name: And Dueling Peacocks
episodes.overview: Vivian's wedding guests mingle with monkeys at her jungle themed brunch, while cougar Debbie shows off her peacock pride and her cub. Kim's red and black theme shines through on her dress, while Bianca's peacock theme tops her cake, centerpieces and more.

episodes.name: And a Mardi Gras Indian
episodes.overview: Mardi Gras Indians perform at Joanna's New Orleans style wedding, while Anitra's soiree includes king cakes and a second line band. Emma gives her reception space a French Quarter look, while Princess bride Brittany exchanges vows in a castle.

episodes.name: And a Swamp Buggy
episodes.overview: Sarah's groom arrives in a swamp buggy to their country themed wedding, while Janelle's guests ride on rickshaws to her Asian inspired reception. Annie raps and dances for her music loving groom, while Carole delights with a food inspired theme.

episodes.name: And Red Velvet Funnel Cake
episodes.overview: Rachele enters her reception to the beat of performing Japanese Taiko drummers while Nicolle's husband's college mascot helps cut their cake. Travia celebrates her wedding and her 30th birthday with bling and Alex shows off her bookworm DIY style.

episodes.name: And the Harlem Shake
episodes.overview: Cheerleader Chancy gets a welcome to her reception with the Harlem Shake while a band leads Marcela into her Peruvian inspired party. Amanda has a dollhouse collection tour at her historic venue and Chantall's dogs are formally dressed for her nuptials.

episodes.name: And a Wax Museum
episodes.overview: Jen's retro-chic themed wedding is at a historic downtown bar, while Brook's party is at a French Quarter wax museum. Camille's jazz band kicks off the bride versus groom dance off and Mia's slides in to her Fat Monday soiree on a Mardi Gras float.

episodes.name: And a Talking Orchid
episodes.overview: Barefoot Kim strolls down a burlap aisle at her orchid farm wedding, while first mate Jessica ties the knot at a yacht club. Lily ‘s hula dancing and Mama Juana are a big hit, while Ruby's dinner fiery presentation gets the guest brides excited.

episodes.name: And a Superdome
episodes.overview: Bling Queen Tamika exchanges vows at the New Orleans Superdome, while old soul Megan marries outdoors on a Louisiana plantation. Hairstylist Karen decorates her cake to match the layers of her dress and Diva bride Michelle wants everything purple.

episodes.name: And Two Flower-Men
episodes.overview: Ashley ends her plantation ceremony with a dove release, while Christian masquerades into her candle lit nightclub reception. Courtney says I do at her flower filled affair, while Joy struts her peacocks and treats guests to liquor-filled cupcakes.

episodes.name: And a Sting Ray
episodes.overview: Emily goes back in time at her American Main Street nuptials, while Jessica exchanges vows at a historic New Orleans Landmark. Sheral's arranged marriage takes place at a downtown hotel, while Fallon seals her ten-year engagement with a Catholic ceremony.

episodes.name: And a Candle Bar
episodes.overview: Melissa and her groom share their love at a Hollywood inspired affair, while Laura's waterside wedding is accented with Penn State flair. Audrianna's guests enjoy the glamour at her boat house venue and Dee's guests make their own favors at a candle bar.

9.status_message: The resource you requested could not be found.
